material: Two Layer Turnout Gear Moisture Barrier
description: Two layer turnout gear moisture barrier is the layer of firefighter turnout gear comprised of an aramid matrix with a moisture-resistance substrate.
short desc: Two layer turnout gear moisture barrier is the middle layer of firefighter turnout gear.
source: Sampled from a structural firefighter turnout gear.

measured property.test description: Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.
